original_text:
Although I trained and strengthened their arms,
    yet they devise evil against me.
korean_text: 내가 그들 팔을 연습시켜 힘 있게 하였으나 그들은 내게 대하여 악을 꾀하는도다

sentences.original_text: Although I trained and strengthened their arms
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 내가 그들의 팔을 훈련시키고 강하게 했지만

sentences.original_text: yet they devise evil against me.
